nodes.text: The Crysifal Peak was one of the tallest mountains which formed one end of the Ordan Spine Mountains on the planet Weik. Its peak was often shrouded in snow and clouds, and no one had ever survived an attempt to scale its slopes. Aside from the steep ascent, the peak was made dangerous by the trollbane which made their home within the caves along its slopes. It was believed that the sunfire swords of the Paladins of the Adamite Tower was fueled by crystals found in the caves.
